job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Backend Engineer - PerfectScale by DoiT
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will be working on the core backend solutions, powering PerfectScale data pipeline and business logic. You'll be collaborating with product managers, and developers from other teams and also participate in product-making decisions., * Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers to deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems
     * Implementing features. From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance. You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
     * Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices, you will also ensure clean code and best practices while performing code reviews for your peers
     * Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
     * Providing feedback. The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
job_details.full_text:
Senior Backend Engineer - PerfectScale by DoiT

As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will be working on the core backend solutions, powering PerfectScale data pipeline and business logic. You'll be collaborating with product managers, and developers from other teams and also participate in product-making decisions., * Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers to deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems
     * Implementing features. From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance. You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
     * Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices, you will also ensure clean code and best practices while performing code reviews for your peers
     * Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
     * Providing feedback. The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering tasks such as implementing features, writing clean code, code reviews, and improving codebase health. While it mentions collaboration with product and DevOps teams, and participation in product-making decisions, it lacks specific details or requirements related to AI, machine learning, generative models, or data science. The core responsibilities described align more with a general backend engineering role rather than a specialized AI/ML role.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'core backend solutions', 'implementing features', 'write clean and maintainable code', 'engineering best practices', 'code reviews', and 'improving the health of the codebase', which are all core activities of software development.
The phrase 'Implementing features. From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance' directly describes the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing features. From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance

job_tasks.justification: The instruction to 'Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices' and 'perform code reviews' are fundamental software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices, you will also ensure clean code and best practices while performing code reviews for your peers

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Improving the health of the codebase' and 'accumulating technical debt' relates to maintaining and refactoring existing software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'collaborating with product managers' and participating in 'product-making decisions', indicating an involvement in understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborating with product managers, and developers from other teams and also participate in product-making decisions

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states 'Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers' and 'The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other', highlighting teamwork and communication.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems' and 'trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible' points to problem-solving and proactive identification of issues.
job_tasks.phrase: deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems

job_tasks.justification: The expectation to 'propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products' indicates a need for initiative and ownership.
job_tasks.phrase: You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible' demonstrates collaborative feedback and communication within the team.
job_tasks.phrase: The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
